commentBody: For goodness sake, have they still not figured out that nothing actually happened?  This is high school science. Air contracts in the cold. Multiple groups tested and showed that the deflation can be explained by cold air alone. It would be useful to mention this in every article about this nonsense, just to make clear that this is all pointless.

replies.commentBody: and how do you explain the equipment personnel's discussion of deflating balls for Brady, and Brady's destruction of the phone?  that is the relevant evidence.  Boston fans' fixation on the "Ideal Gas Law" ignores the main evidence completely!
